        public java.lang.Object run(java.lang.Object... args)
        Runs the probabilistic program.
        Specified by:
        run in class ChimpleProgram
        Parameters:
        args - Static parameters that the solver will pass to your probabilistic program every time it's run.
        Returns:
        An array of points in the format (x1, y1, x2, y2) where (x1, y1) are anchor points and (x2, y2) are control points.
